content.text: Match ends, Southampton 0, Manchester United 1.

Substitution, Manchester United. Daley Blind replaces Marcus Rashford.
Ander Herrera (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Charlie Austin (Southampton).
